short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parses and scrapes BuzzMart to make it easier to save and export cart data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Primarily for users in the Georgia Tech MSE department. Loads a small script into the BuzzMart and MSEForms purchasing applications to scrape cart data and perform one click listings into MSEForms. Source code is available on the internal Georgia Tech Github server at: https://github.gatech.edu/bpiercy3/better-buzzmart.

Still to be done:
- Capture Accounting codes (e.g. project number, account numbers)

Please comment (and document with screenshots if possible) if you identify any bugs.

--- CHANGELOG ---
**UPDATE 0.1.9** 2018-08-01
Updated code to work with revised Buzzmart system + to be compatible with the "Non-contract" form option.

**UPDATE 0.1.7** 2017-10-17
Fixed the icon (hopefully).

**UPDATE 0.1.6** 2017-07-25
Limits description length in MSE Fusion to 200 characters.

**UPDATE 0.1.5**
"Add to MSE Forms" now auto-generates rows when you click the button, instead of needing to manually add rows.

**UPDATE 0.1.4**
Modified the popup window to have the "Add to MSE Forms" section at the top of screen instead of at the bottom.

**UPDATE 0.1.3**
Added a "Number of Items" line to the popup.
Enforced 2-digit rounding to the total line.

**UPDATE 0.1.2**
Now captures the Requisition Number from BuzzMart.

**UPDATE 0.1.1**
Updated the extension to be compatible with the new MSEFusion system. Behavior should be the same as before with MSEForms.
